reason: Task analysis: Identify the aggregate score for a July 2006 competition match between IK Start and Skála ÍF, where the second leg had 1,477 attendance. All three members conducted comprehensive web searches with systematic approaches. Member 1 evaluation: Used targeted search strategy focusing on UEFA competitions, processed 120 search results from authoritative sources including UEFA.com, ESPN, and Transfermarkt. Identified competition as UEFA Cup 2006/07 First Qualifying Round with first leg (Skála ÍF 0-1 IK Start, July 13) and second leg (IK Start 3-0 Skála ÍF, July 27) results. Calculated aggregate score as 4-0 to IK Start with proper verification methodology. Member 2 evaluation: Employed similar comprehensive search approach, processed 139 search results with 46 highly relevant sources. Reached identical findings: UEFA Cup 2006-07 First Qualifying Round, same leg scores (0-1, 3-0), same aggregate result (4-0), with additional detail on goalscorers. Demonstrated strong source verification and documentation practices. Member 3 evaluation: Conducted thorough analysis processing 138 search results with 29 high-relevance results. Confirmed identical match details and aggregate score through multiple authoritative sources including UEFA.com and Wikipedia. Provided comprehensive evidence validation with detailed source tracking. Convergence analysis: Perfect agreement across all members on competition identification (UEFA Cup 2006-07), match dates (July 13 & 27, 2006), individual leg scores (0-1, 3-0), attendance figure (1,477), and aggregate result (4-0). No contradictions identified. Integration assessment: All members demonstrated methodologically sound research approaches with proper source verification. The consistent findings across independent searches using different query strategies provides high confidence in result accuracy. Final validation: Multiple authoritative sources (UEFA.com, ESPN, Transfermarkt, Wikipedia) confirm IK Start defeated Skála ÍF 4-0 on aggregate in the UEFA Cup 2006-07 First Qualifying Round.
